sentence.Network_en: He isolated himself till the space he filled in the public eye was contemptibly small.
sentence.Network_cn: 他独来独往,至使他的存在在大伙儿的眼里变得无足轻重.

auth_sentence.content: That this post as a critic was a contemptibly small acorn was made obvious at my first press view of an exhibition.
